consoleData.description: If enabled will keep in-memory backups to handle reconnecting players even if the backup files aren't written to disk

uiData.label: mp_backup_round_auto
uiData.helperText: If enabled will keep in-memory backups to handle reconnecting players even if the backup files aren't written to disk

consoleData.description: If set then server will save all played rounds information to files filename_date_time_team1_team2_mapname_roundnum_score1_score2.txt

uiData.label: mp_backup_round_file
uiData.helperText: If set then server will save all played rounds information to files filename_date_time_team1_team2_mapname_roundnum_score1_score2.txt

consoleData.description: Every time a backup file is written the value of this convar gets updated to hold the name of the backup file.

uiData.label: mp_backup_round_file_last
uiData.helperText: Every time a backup file is written the value of this convar gets updated to hold the name of the backup file.

consoleData.description: If set then server will save all played rounds information to files named by this pattern, e.g.'%prefix%_%date%_%time%_%team1%_%team2%_%map%_round%round%_score_%score1%_%score2%.txt'

uiData.label: mp_backup_round_file_pattern
uiData.helperText: If set then server will save all played rounds information to files named by this pattern, e.g.'%prefix%_%date%_%time%_%team1%_%team2%_%map%_round%round%_score_%score1%_%score2%.txt'
